sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கவனி, கேள், செவி கொடு, கூப்பிடு
to hear, to be attentive, to heed, to incline (used of ears), to attend (used of ears), to hearken, to pay attention, to listen
a) (Qal) incline, to attend (used of ears), to hearken, to pay attention, to listen
b) (Hiphil) to pay attention, to give attention
Cognate: H7181, H7182, H7183
